name: The Vanished Colour
description: In the start of the game you will see several shapes with different colours on the screen, try to remember the colours of all the shapes in a limit time, after the limit time, the screen will be covered, and then open up again, when the screen reopens, one of the shapes’ colour will be vanished, and you will have to recall the vanished colour from your memory to choose the correct colour to pass.
